select
from course_tables,day_time,date_time,grade,class_room,grade_teacher,teacher,week,grade_sircle where course_tables.grade_id = grade.grade_id and course_tables.classroom_id = class_room.classroom_id AND course_tables.date_time_id = date_time.date_time_id AND course_tables.day_time_id = day_time.day_time_id AND grade.grade_id = grade_teacher.grade_id AND teacher.teacher_id = grade_teacher.teacher_id
AND grade.grade_id = grade_sircle.grade_id AND week.week_id = grade_sircle.week_id
AND course_tables_id = #{courseTablesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
